statements: SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach';
SELECT incident_date, location, reporter_name FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT description, reporter_name FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY reporter_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC, incident_type;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, location FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT incident_type FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE location = 'Building A';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE incident_type LIKE '%Theft%';
SELECT reporter_name, reporter_contact FROM SecurityIncidents GROUP BY reporter_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_type, incident_date FROM incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_type = 'Data Leak';
SELECT incident_id, description FROM incidents WHERE incident_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT breach_id, impact FROM security_breaches ORDER BY breach_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, incident_type FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Security Breach';
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, investigator_id FROM incidents JOIN security_breaches ON incidents.incident_id = security_breaches.incident_id;
SELECT incident_id, COUNT(*) AS total_breaches FROM security_breaches GROUP BY incident_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT IncidentID, IncidentType, IncidentDate FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY IncidentDate DESC;
SELECT IncidentType, IncidentDetails FROM SecurityIncidents WHERE IncidentType='Data Breach';
SELECT * FROM SecurityBreachDetails WHERE BreachType='Phishing' AND BreachDate >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT TeamName, TeamLead FROM InvestigationTeam WHERE TeamLead='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM SecurityIncidents;
SELECT IncidentID, IncidentType, IncidentDate FROM SecurityIncidents ORDER BY IncidentDate DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityBreachDetails WHERE BreachType = 'Data Breach';
SELECT TeamName, TeamLead, TeamMembers FROM InvestigationTeam WHERE TeamLead = 'John Doe';
SELECT IncidentType, COUNT(*) FROM SecurityIncidents GROUP BY IncidentType ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM involved_parties WHERE party_type = 'Employee';
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM security_incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM breach_details WHERE breach_type = 'Data Breach' ORDER BY breach_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description FROM breach_details WHERE breach_type='Data Breach';
SELECT location, incident_description FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_date='2022-03-15';
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM involved_parties ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM evidence WHERE incident_id=(SELECT incident_id FROM breach_details WHERE breach_type='Physical Breach');
SELECT * FROM breach_details
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description FROM security_incidents
SELECT entity_name, breach_date FROM affected_entities
SELECT team_name, lead_investigator, assigned_incident_id FROM investigation_team
SELECT evidence_type, evidence_details FROM evidence
SELECT * FROM security_incidents
SELECT * FROM breach_details ORDER BY breach_date DESC
SELECT entity_name, incident_date FROM affected_entities INNER JOIN security_incidents ON affected_entities.incident_id = security_incidents.incident_id
SELECT team_name, lead_investigator FROM investigation_team WHERE assigned_incident_id = 1
SELECT evidence_type, evidence_details FROM evidence WHERE incident_id = 3
